name: 8041-456 top-down sweater
notes:
8041-456 jumper
[pattern spanish english french german italian dutch][1]
[pattern pdf danish][2]

---------------

it is worked in the round from top down on circular needles and is seamless. it is started at the neck-line, working with right side facing, distributing the increases throughout the depth of the yoke as far as the sleeves. the sleeve stitches are then left on hold and then brought back into the work later.
